# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: django cms add plugin in template

Відповідь: 1. Login to your Django CMS admin panel and select the Templates section.

2. Select the template you wish to add a plugin to and click on it.

3. On the template editor page, click the Placeholders tab.

4. Select the placeholder which you want to add a plugin to and click on the plus sign (+) to the right.

5. A menu appears providing you with a list of available plugins. Select the plugin you want to add. 

6. The plugin will now be shown inside the placeholder. The plugin can be edited via the plugin editor.

7. To display the live page, click the Preview & Publish button at the bottom of the page.
